name: Beat 'em Vania
description:
Class assigment that resulted in this simple level of a Beat 'Em Up with a vampiric gothic aesthetic.
Use A and D to move, S to crouch, U to jump and I to attack.

Art: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/gothicvania-cemetery-120509

Music: Castlevania Symphony of the Night
